Package view

  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    AddAppointmentController
    class AddAppointmentController.java Acts as controller and validation for Add Appointment screen UI when creating a new appointment.
    AddCustomerController
    class AddCustomerController.java Acts as controller and validation for Add Customer screen UI when creating a new customer.
    LoginController
    class LoginController.java Acts as controller and user validation for login screen UI when users perform login attempts.
    MainScreenController
    class MainScreenController.java Acts as controller and validation for main screen UI, displays customers and appointments in tables.
    ReportsController
    class ReportsController.java Acts as controller for Reports fxml.
    SchedulingSystem
    class SchedulingSystem.java Acts as main application class to start program and hosts stages for UI to be called.
    UpdateAppointmentController
    class UpdateAppointmentController.java Acts as controller and validation for update appointment UI.
    UpdateCustomerController
    class UpdateCustomerController.java Acts as controller and validation for Update Customer screen UI when updating an existing customer.
  • Enum Summary
    Enum Description
    MainScreenController.Month
    Enumerator containing months in year, used for querying appointments for report.
